title: Giving Back
intro: We invest time and resources to support local communities and causes aligned with our mission. This section highlights our ongoing initiatives and how you can get involved.

items.title: Vets Who Code
items.body: A nonprofit that teaches veterans software development and coding skills to help them transition into tech careers.

items.title: Commit Foundation
items.body: Provides personalized transition support, mentorship, and career resources to help veterans and military spouses find meaningful civilian careers.

items.title: Hiring Our Heroes
items.body: An initiative of the U.S. Chamber of Commerce Foundation that connects veterans, service members, and military spouses with meaningful employment opportunities.

items.title: Bunker Labs
items.body: A national network of veteran and military spouse entrepreneurs dedicated to helping the military-connected community start and grow businesses.

items.title: Code Platoon
items.body: A nonprofit coding bootcamp that prepares veterans and military spouses for software engineering careers through immersive training and internships.
